acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in a POJO with basic jvm types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldGenerateBasicTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo

Then the Object OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 42 byteObjectField = 5 shortField = 19 shortObjectField = 106 charField = D charObjectField = 1 intField = -833346199 intObjectField = -1948105407 longField = 147184484854158 longObjectField = 147184482303167 floatField = 0.12997901 floatObjectField = 0.86562324 doubleField = 0.9700668287268084 doubleObjectField = 0.21909053266068335 stringField = SM6ssxwP8Y objectField = java.lang.Object@40e0213c calendarField = Fri Jun 12 00:13:32 BST 2015 dateField = Fri Jun 12 00:13:32 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@fd6784a intArray = [I@272ee84a booleanArray = [Z@5eab49e8 bigDecimalField = 215846383431 ) should not be null
Then the Pojo should contain some data
